sentences.english: He belongs to the rich and powerful families in this region.
sentences.chinese: 他是這一帶的豪門富戶。

sentences.english: He who oppresses the poor to increase his wealth and he who gives gifts to the rich-both come to poverty. Sayings of the Wise
sentences.chinese: 欺壓貧窮爲要利己的，並送禮與富戶的，都必缺乏。

sentences.english: The rich ruleth over the poor, and the borrower is servant to the lender.
sentences.chinese: 富戶管轄窮人，欠債的是債主的僕人。

sentences.english: A prosperous 12 family in the community offered him free room and board.
sentences.chinese: 社區裏的一個富戶免費給他提供喫住，但他婉言謝絕。

sentences.english: This family is the richest for tens of miles around.
sentences.chinese: 這戶人家是方圓數十里的第一富戶。

sentences.english: He that oppresseth the poor to increase his riches, and he that giveth to the rich, shall surely come to want.
sentences.chinese: 欺壓貧窮爲要利己的，並送禮與富戶的，都必缺乏。

sentences.english: The rich man had exceeding many flocks and herds

definition: public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to whine on for days (idiom)/to endlessly grumble complaints/incessant whining
HDB flats/public apartment flats (in Singapore and Malaysia)
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
to raise a loan/to borrow money
